title: Pan-fried pear and fig pancakes
ingredients: ['300 ml (10 fl oz) skimmed milk', '1 egg', '100 g (3½ oz) plain white or plain wholemeal flour, or a mixture', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', 'Salt', '2 teaspoons sunflower oil', 'For the filling', '20 g (¾ oz) butter', '700 g (1 lb 9 oz) pears, peeled, cored and chopped', '100 g (3½ oz) ready-to-eat dried figs, chopped', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', 'A pinch of ground cloves', 'Grated zest of ½ orange', '90 g (3¼ oz) soft brown sugar', 'To serve: 4 tablespoons half-fat crème fraîche or Greek yoghurt and 4 tablespoons maple syrup, optional']
